titleStmt.title: Ireland. By the Commissioners of the Common-wealth of England, for the affairs of Ireland. The said Commissioners, taking into their consideration the want the forces in Ireland would be in the next vvinter for hay, fire and candle, if a timely provision were not made for them, did by their order of the 21. of April last, referr the same to a Committee of Officers, who have (in order to a timely supply) offered as followeth.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Commissioners of the Common-wealth of England for the Affairs of Ireland.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in: Library Company of Philadelphia.
